topic.title: Windows installer
topic.shortdesc: How to install the agent under Windows

body.p: You have to download the installer package from the following FusionInventory page:http://prebuilt.fusioninventory.org/stable/windows-i386/
You will just have to launch the installer for an interactive installation process.
body.note: The installer contains an embedded version of Perl that was specially made for usage with FusionInventory. It's not necessary to additionally install Perl for this. The embedded perl doesn't conflict with another version that may be installed on the system.
If you want to use the network discovery and nmap feature, you will have to install the Windows-version of nmap. You can find the most recent version here: http://nmap.org/download.html.
